meaningMnemonic: Put an <radical>axe</radical> in your <radical>mouth</radical> with your <radical>fingers</radical> to express your <kanji>philosophy</kanji>. Your philosophy of putting weapons in your mouth. Everyone else seems to think it's a stupid philosophy, so you're showing them that it's not with actions!
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>philosophy</kanji> on weapons in mouths means you're always tasting <reading>鉄</reading> (てつ). They say blood tastes like copper, well weapons taste like iron.
